actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: To amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to provide that, for purposes of determining the duty payable with respect to imported merchandise, the value of imported merchandise includes any export quota premium.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to include the cost of all export guota rights in the export value of merchandise imported into the United States.

titles.title: To amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to provide that, for purposes of determining the duty payable with respect to imported merchandise, the value of imported merchandise includes any export quota premium.
